attributes.action: Nurses who are working here should be exempted from hotel quarantine
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do so because we are stressed and mentally drain we need to see our families we can not function well and render service under frustration not seeing our families we are human and we are allowed to be with our families
attributes.background: To allow us go and see our families and not hotel quarantine when we come back as we sacrificed during the of the pandemic where were work and couldnt go home and some of us died without seeing their families

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about existing requirements for people travelling to the UK from certain countries to enter managed quarantine, but we're not sure if you want nurses to be able to quarantine at home, or not have to quarantine at all.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Allow vaccinated health and social care workers to isolate at home: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602182
